description:
Scarlet infiltrates the slave auction, but her priority is to find and pummel Lord Godwin.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Kobushi no Omoibito (Sandbag) ni Ai ni Itte mo Yoroshii Deshouka
May I Go to See My Fists` Beloved One (Punching Bag)?
¿Puedo ir a ver a aquel que anhelan mis puños (mi saco de boxeo)?
拳の想い人(サンドバッグ)に会いに行ってもよろしいでしょうか
